verses.verse: Now it came to pass <S%H2346><s%>, when the wall was built <S%H1129><s%>, and I had set up <S%H5975><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%>, and the porters <S%H7778><s%> and the singers <S%H7891><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were appointed <S%H6485><s%>,

That I gave my brother <S%H251><s%> Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the palace <S%H1002><s%>, charge <S%H6680><s%> over Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: for he was a faithful <S%H571><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, and feared <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> above many <S%H7227><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8179><s%>, Let not the gates of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> be opened <S%H6605><s%> until the sun <S%H8121><s%> be hot <S%H2527><s%>; and while they stand by <S%H5975><s%>, let them shut <S%H1479><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%>, and bar <S%H270><s%> them <S%H5975><s%>: and appoint watches <S%H4931><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> in his watch <S%H4929><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> to be over against his house <S%H1004><s%>.

Now the city <S%H5892><s%> was large <S%H7342><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%>: but the people <S%H5971><s%> were few <S%H4592><s%> in it <S%H8432><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> were not built <S%H1129><s%>.

And my God <S%H430><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> into my heart <S%H3820><s%> to gather together <S%H6908><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%>, and the rulers <S%H5461><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they might be reckoned by genealogy <S%H3187><s%>. And I found <S%H4672><s%> a register <S%H5612><s%> of the genealogy <S%H3188><s%> of them which came up <S%H5927><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> written in it <S%H3789><s%>,

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the province <S%H4082><s%>, that went up <S%H5927><s%> out of the captivity <S%H7628><s%>, of those that had been carried away <S%H1473><s%>, whom Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried away <S%H1540><s%>, and came again <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and to Judah <S%H3063><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> unto his city <S%H5892><s%>;

Who came <S%H935><s%> with Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%>, Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, Raamiah <S%H7485><s%>, Nahamani <S%H5167><s%>, Mordecai <S%H4782><s%>, Bilshan <S%H1114><s%>, Mispereth <S%H4559><s%>, Bigvai <S%H902><s%>, Nehum <S%H5149><s%>, Baanah <S%H1196><s%>. The number <S%H4557><s%>, I say <S%H582><s%>, of the men of the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel was this <S%H3478><s%>;
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh <S%H6551><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Arah <S%H733><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath <S%H6355><s%>–moab, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> and Joab <S%H3097><s%>, two thousand <S%H505><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighteen <S%H8083><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zattu <S%H2240><s%>, eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccai <S%H2140><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Binnui <S%H1131><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai <S%H893><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azgad <S%H5803><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adonikam <S%H140><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bigvai <S%H902><s%>, two thousand <S%H505><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adin <S%H5720><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater <S%H333><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>, ninety <S%H8673><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bezai <S%H1209><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hariph <S%H2756><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, ninety <S%H8673><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Beth <S%H1035><s%>–lehem and Netophah <S%H5199><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Beth <S%H1041><s%>–azmaveth, forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Kirjath <S%H7157><s%>–jearim, Chephirah <S%H3716><s%>, and Beeroth <S%H881><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Geba <S%H1387><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and one <S%H259><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Michmas <S%H4363><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el and Ai <S%H5857><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%>.
The men <S%H582><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> Elam <S%H5867><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim <S%H2766><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lod <S%H3850><s%>, Hadid <S%H2307><s%>, and Ono <S%H207><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and one <S%H259><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Senaah <S%H5570><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>.

The priests <S%H3548><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pashur <S%H6583><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim <S%H2766><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> and seventeen <S%H7651><s%>.

The Levites <S%H3881><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, of Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hodevah <S%H1937><s%>, seventy <S%H7657><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.
The singers <S%H7891><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.

The porters <S%H7778><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shallum <S%H7967><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater <S%H333><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Talmon <S%H2929><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatita <S%H2410><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobai <S%H7630><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.
The Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ziha <S%H6727><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashupha <S%H2817><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tabbaoth <S%H2884><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keros <S%H7026><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sia <S%H5517><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Padon <S%H6303><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lebana <S%H3838><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hagaba <S%H2286><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shalmai <S%H8014><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hanan <S%H2605><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel <S%H1435><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gahar <S%H1515><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reaiah <S%H7211><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rezin <S%H7526><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda <S%H5353><s%>,

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Besai <S%H1153><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Meunim <S%H4586><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nephishesim <S%H5300><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bakbuk <S%H1227><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hakupha <S%H2709><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harhur <S%H2744><s%>,

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Neziah <S%H5335><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatipha <S%H2412><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sotai <S%H5479><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sophereth <S%H5618><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perida <S%H6514><s%>,
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaala <S%H3279><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Darkon <S%H1874><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel <S%H1435><s%>,

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hattil <S%H2411><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pochereth of Zebaim <S%H6380><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amon <S%H526><s%>.

All the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>, were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.

And these were they which went up <S%H5927><s%> also from Tel <S%H8528><s%>–melah, Tel <S%H8521><s%>–haresha, Cherub <S%H3743><s%>, Addon <S%H114><s%>, and Immer <S%H564><s%>: but they could <S%H3201><s%> not show <S%H5046><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, nor their seed <S%H2233><s%>, whether they were of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah <S%H1806><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda <S%H5353><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.

And of the priests <S%H3548><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Habaiah <S%H2252><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Koz <S%H6976><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Barzillai <S%H1271><s%>, which took <S%H3947><s%> one of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>, and was called <S%H7121><s%> after their name <S%H8034><s%>.

These sought <S%H1245><s%> their register <S%H3791><s%> among those that were reckoned by genealogy <S%H3187><s%>, but it was not found <S%H4672><s%>: therefore were they <S%H1351><s%>, as polluted, put from the priesthood <S%H3550><s%>.

And the Tirshatha <S%H8660><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H398><s%>, that they should not eat of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, until there stood <S%H5975><s%> up a priest <S%H3548><s%> with Urim <S%H224><s%> and Thummim <S%H8550><s%>.
The whole congregation <S%H6951><s%> together <S%H259><s%> was forty <S%H702><s%> and two thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%>,

Beside their manservants <S%H5650><s%> and their maidservants <S%H519><s%>, of whom there were seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>: and they had two hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> singing men <S%H7891><s%> and singing women <S%H7891><s%>.

Their horses <S%H5483><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%>: their mules <S%H6505><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>:

Their camels <S%H1581><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>: six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> donkeys <S%H2543><s%>.

And some of <S%H7117><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the work <S%H4399><s%>. The Tirshatha <S%H8660><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the treasure <S%H214><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> drams <S%H1871><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, fifty <S%H2572><s%> basins <S%H4219><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%>' garments <S%H3801><s%>.

And some of the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the treasure <S%H214><s%> of the work <S%H4399><s%> twenty <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H7239><s%> drams <S%H1871><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and two thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%> pound <S%H4488><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And that which the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> was twenty <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H7239><s%> drams <S%H1871><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and two thousand <S%H505><s%> pound <S%H4488><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and sixty <S%H8346><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%>' garments <S%H3801><s%>.

So the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and the porters <S%H7778><s%>, and the singers <S%H7891><s%>, and some of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, lived <S%H3427><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%>; and when the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> came <S%H5060><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were in their cities <S%H5892><s%>.
